about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the mysterious and confusing world of Backrooms with Welcome to the Backrooms, a thrilling single-player adventure that will test your nerves. Play as an M.E.G agent. (Major Exploration Group) sent on a mission to explore and survive in this strange and threatening environment.

In this game you will have to face endless mazes of yellowish corridors, each hiding its own traps and mysteries. But it's not just the walls that pose a threat - hostile entities lurk in the shadows, ready to attack at the slightest opportunity.

main Features :


  • Intense Exploration: Travel the endless corridors of the Backrooms, discover clues about the true nature of this place and find a way to escape.
  • Survival: Avoid and escape the scary entities that haunt the place. Every encounter can be fatal, so stay on your guard.
  • Riddles and Mysteries: Solve complex puzzles to progress and reveal the secrets hidden in the depths of the Backrooms.
  • Oppressive Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in an immersive and distressing atmosphere with sound and visual design that reinforces the feeling of constant danger.

Get ready for an intense gaming experience where every hallway corner can be your last. “Welcome to the Backrooms” is a survival challenge that will test your skills and courage. Can you find the exit before it's too late?

Join us on this terrifying adventure and find out if you have what it takes to escape the Backrooms.

Add to your wishlist now and prepare for the ultimate survival test!

short_description: Welcome to the Backrooms is a single-player adventure where you play as an M.E.G. agent in mysterious labyrinths. Escape terrifying entities, solve puzzles, and survive in an oppressive atmosphere. Uncover the secrets of the Backrooms and find the exit before it's too late.
